languages.text: "Если у меня возникнет хотя бы одно подозрение, что ты права, я первым делом проверю, можно ли умереть в реальном мире, перерезав себе глотку в грезе".
"If I ever suspect that you may be right, the first thing I'll do is test your theory — by seeing what happens if I slit my own throat."
languages.original_text: "Если у меня возникнет хотя бы одно подозрение, что ты права, я первым делом проверю, можно ли умереть в реальном мире, перерезав себе глотку в грезе".

traits.locale_text: "If I ever suspect that you may be right, the first thing I'll do is test your theory — by seeing what happens if I slit your throat."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If I ever suspect that you may be right, the first thing I'll do is test your theory — by seeing what happens if I slit your throat."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If I ever suspect that you may be right, the first thing I'll do is test your theory — by seeing what happens if I slit your throat."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If I ever suspect that you may be right, the first thing I'll do is test your theory — by seeing what happens if I slit my own throat."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “如果我也认为你想得没错，那我第一件要做的事情，就是验证这个理论的真伪。具体来说就是，我会割开我自己的喉咙，看看会怎么样。”
languages.original_text: "If I ever suspect that you may be right, the first thing I'll do is test your theory — by seeing what happens if I slit my own throat."

traits.locale_text: “如果我也认为你想得没错，那我第一件要做的事情，就是验证这个理论的真伪。具体来说就是，我会割开你的喉咙，看看会怎么样。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Si j'avais le moindre soupçon, la première chose que je ferais, ce serait mettre votre théorie à l'épreuve... en me tranchant la gorge pour voir ce qu'il se passe. »
languages.original_text: "If I ever suspect that you may be right, the first thing I'll do is test your theory — by seeing what happens if I slit my own throat."

traits.locale_text: « Si j'avais le moindre soupçon, la première chose que je ferais, ce serait mettre votre théorie à l'épreuve... en vous tranchant la gorge pour voir ce qu'il se passe. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Si alguna vez sospecho que puede tener razón, lo primero que haré será poner a prueba la teoría viendo qué sucede al rebanarme el pescuezo yo misma».
languages.original_text: "If I ever suspect that you may be right, the first thing I'll do is test your theory — by seeing what happens if I slit my own throat."

traits.locale_text: «Si alguna vez sospecho que puede tener razón, lo primero que haré será poner a prueba la teoría viendo qué sucede al rebanarle el pescuezo».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「今度、お前に疑念を感じたら、真っ先にその仮説をテストしてみよう…それも、自らの喉をかっ切って何が起こるかを見てやる」
languages.original_text: "If I ever suspect that you may be right, the first thing I'll do is test your theory — by seeing what happens if I slit my own throat."

traits.locale_text: 「今度、お前に疑念を感じたら、真っ先にその仮説をテストしてみよう…その喉をかっ切って何が起こるか見てやる」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Sollte ich jemals vermuten, dass Ihr recht haben könntet, werde ich Eure Theorie auf die Probe stellen, indem ich sehe, was passiert, wenn ich mir selbst die Kehle aufschlitze."
languages.original_text: "If I ever suspect that you may be right, the first thing I'll do is test your theory — by seeing what happens if I slit my own throat."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich je vermute, dass Ihr recht haben könntet, werde ich Eure Theorie auf die Probe stellen. Und zwar, indem ich Euch die Kehle aufschlitze und sehe, was geschieht."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "If I ever suspect that you may be right, the first thing I'll do is test your theory — by seeing what happens if I slit your throat."

languages.text: "Haklı olduğunu düşünürsem ilk yapacağım şey, kendi boğazımı kesince ne olacağına bakarak teorini test etmek olacak."
languages.original_text: "If I ever suspect that you may be right, the first thing I'll do is test your theory — by seeing what happens if I slit my own throat."

traits.locale_text: "Haklı olduğunu düşünürsem ilk yapacağım şey, kendi boğazımı kesince ne olacağına bakarak teorini test etmek olacak."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
